name: Zelda 3
description:
Princess Hyrule has been kidnapped by Gannon again.  You, Zelda, must save her.  Go and bring peace that all true warriors strive for.

Note: An analog control gamepad is required.

For 1 to 4 players

Controls

  • X - Attack
  • A - Jump
  • Y - Shoot
  • LT - Guard/Target
  • Start (players 2-4 only) - Join/leave game
  • Aerial attacks will bypass shields
